testsuite.name: com.example.demo.infrastructure.driving.controller.BookControllerTest

testcase.name: should return 500 when use case throws unexpected exception()
should return books when GET is called()
should reserve a book if not already reserved()
should return 400 when POST payload is invalid()
should return message if book already reserved()
should create a book when POST is called()
should fallback to default reservation value if isReserved is missing()
